SETS.LaTeX: \text{Let } I \text{ be the set of nodes, } J \text{ be the set of links, and } K \text{ be the set of paths.}

VARIABLES.name: y_AC
VARIABLES.description: Binary variable indicating whether link AC is used (1 if used, 0 otherwise)

VARIABLES.name: y_AD
VARIABLES.description: Binary variable indicating whether link AD is used (1 if used, 0 otherwise)

VARIABLES.name: y_AE
VARIABLES.description: Binary variable indicating whether link AE is used (1 if used, 0 otherwise)

VARIABLES.name: x_AC
VARIABLES.description: Quantity of bandwidth on link AC

VARIABLES.name: x_AD
VARIABLES.description: Quantity of bandwidth on link AD

VARIABLES.name: x_AE
VARIABLES.description: Quantity of bandwidth on link AE

PARAMETERS.name: bandwidth_AE_direct
PARAMETERS.description: Direct bandwidth between A and E

PARAMETERS.name: bandwidth_BE_direct
PARAMETERS.description: Direct bandwidth between B and E

PARAMETERS.name: sum_bandwidth
PARAMETERS.description: Sum of bandwidths must be at least 100

PARAMETERS.name: transmission_efficiency_AE
PARAMETERS.description: Transmission efficiency of path between A and E

PARAMETERS.name: transmission_efficiency_DE
PARAMETERS.description: Transmission efficiency of path between D and E

PARAMETERS.name: transmission_efficiency_AB
PARAMETERS.description: Transmission efficiency of path between A and B

OBJECTIVE.query: maximize the bandwidth of the link between A and E passing through C.

CONSTRAINTS.name: sum_bandwidth_constraint
CONSTRAINTS.query: The sum of bandwith is at least 100
